Hello! ALERT Comprehensive Specialized Hospital was established in 1934. It was originally founded as a leprosarium by the Sudan Interior Mission (SIM) and was first named Princess Zenebework Memorial Hospital (Source 1: hospital_overview).

Hello! ALERT Comprehensive Specialized Hospital is located at Zenebework, Kolfe Keranyo in Addis Ababa, Ethiopia (Source 2: hospital_overview).

If you need any further assistance or directions, please feel free to call us at +251 113 47 16 32.

hospital-chat-session.assistant:
Hello! According to our information, ALERT Comprehensive Specialized Hospital was established in 1934. It was initially founded as a leprosarium by the Sudan Interior Mission (SIM) and was named Princess Zenebework Memorial Hospital.

(Source: hospital_overview | ID: overview_2)

Hello! ALERT Comprehensive Specialized Hospital is dedicated to enhancing the health and well-being of our community by providing a range of services (Source: mission_1).

Based on the information I have, our services include:

*   **Emergency and Critical Care Medicine:** Provided through our Integrated Trauma Care Center (Source: dept_3).
*   **Neurosurgery:** Offered in conjunction with our trauma center (Source: dept_5).
*   **Internal Medicine:** This department provides services for HIV/AIDS care, treatment, and prevention, as well as Tuberculosis treatment (Source: dept_7).

In addition to clinical care, our hospital is also a center for postgraduate medical education and impactful research (Source: mission_1).

For more detailed information on all our available services, please feel free to contact the hospital directly at +251 113 47 16 32.
